text:
Haha, you don't need to be so nervous,
I think you'll be fine, right?
Hanana, you've been practicing diligently all this time.
And besides, it's not like it's a live broadcast.
â”€But I have to switch my mindset.

I wouldn't want to appear on TV all stiff
with nerves during the dance!

Haha, thank you.
...I hope I can deliver a good performance.

It would be nice if I could say "good job!"
to Haruki-chan and Luca-chan!
